name: Sasindu Wijewardana
title: Full-Stack Developer
subtitle: React | Node.js | Spring Boot
bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I specialize in React for frontend development and Node.js/Spring Boot for backend services. I love creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly solutions.
aboutDescription: I am a dedicated software developer based in Sri Lanka, passionate about creating innovative web solutions. With experience in both frontend and backend technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and modern design principles.

services.title: DESIGN
services.description: I can design websites based on your needs and suggestions. I create modern, responsive layouts that engage users and deliver great experiences.

services.title: DEVELOPMENT
services.description: Full-stack development with React, Node.js, and Spring Boot. I build scalable web applications with clean architecture and best practices.

services.title: MAINTENANCE
services.description: Ongoing support and maintenance for your applications. I ensure your projects stay up-to-date, secure, and performing optimally.
